      • withStartupDirectory

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withStartupDirectory(String path)
        Specifies the startup and working directory of the new JVMs that are representing cloud hosts.
        Parameters:
        path - The valid path to the existing directory in the local file system.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.

      • withClasspath

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withClasspath(String classpath)
        Specifies the class path of the new JVM to start with. java-classpath specification rules are used. Dependencies can be separated by ";" on any platform. Class path specified has to contain all necessary dependencies of the application that has to be started.
        Parameters:
        classpath - The ";" separated set of paths that will be provided to java on JVM startup.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.

      • withCustomJVMArgs

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withCustomJVMArgs(String... parameters)
        Specifies the collection of custom JVM arguments that need to be provided on JVM startup.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The collection of separate parameters passed to JVM on startup.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.

      • withJavaPath

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withJavaPath(String javaPath)
        Specifies the path to the java executable that can be used to start JVM.
        Parameters:
        javaPath - The absolute path to the java executable to start new JVM.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.

      • withServerMode

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withServerMode(boolean isServerMode)
        Specifies whether the JVM should start in server mode.
        Parameters:
        isServerMode - true if server mode should be enabled. Otherwise, false.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.

      • withJavaHeapSizeInMB

        public LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration withJavaHeapSizeInMB(long javaHeapSizeMB)
        Specifies the amount of maximal java heap size to allocate for new JVM.
        Parameters:
        javaHeapSizeMB - The positive long that specifies the amount of megabytes to limit java heap size of new JVM.
        Returns:
        The current instance of LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration to continue configuration.
